summary: Simple doesnt always mean boring. Nothing went in to this player home unless it had a function. No-nonsense, no Feng Shui, just pure plain usability. Lots of room, lots of light and a never-seen-before quest item display to track your progress.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#e69138][color=red][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][/url][/b][/color][/color][/b][/center][center][b][color=#e69138][color=red][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][/url][/b][/color][/color][/b][color=#cc4125][size=6][b][/b][/size][/color][color=#cc4125][b][size=6]Mod works as intended, so don't expect any updates.[/size]
[b][size=4]I don't develop old mods any more.
[/size][/b]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/elianorapwnsu][img]http://i.imgur.com/267fYFk.png[/img][/url]
[url=https://www.youtube.com/c/Elianora][img]http://i.imgur.com/bGTVC9s.png[/img]
[/url][/b][/color]____________________________________________[/center]

[size=4][color=blue][b]FRENCH TRANSLATION[/b][/color][b][color=white] FOR THIS MOD[/color][color=red] CAN BE FOUND [url=http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/forum/viewtopic.php?f=188&t=17812]HERE[/url][/color][/b][/size]
________________________________________________________________________________________

[color=#b22222][size=5][b]:: WELCOME TO THORNROCK 2.0 ! ::[/b][/size][/color]

We've taken on board some feedback and made the best a whole lot better!

Up in the attic, you'll find a well-organised, logically laid out library for you bookworms!
And downstairs, for the true archer, there's the killer new Dynamic Archery Rotary Target (DART) Range!
Rank up your Archery skill by turning OFF your aiming cross-hair and scoring TEN hits in a row without missing!

And from here on, don't forget to check your mailbox once a week or so!

Designed from the ground up to be functional rather than "cozy" you won't find dining tables adorned with crockery you'll never use here!
 
Nothing went in to this player home unless it had a function!
 
Centrally located, Thornrock is a utilitarian, uncluttered "base-of-operations" to return to between questing to organise the stuff you accumulate and prepare for the next mission. 
 
The custom storage is designed so you know at a glance what goes where, just by looking at it.
The workshop, enchanting and alchemy stations have everything you need to craft, logically laid out.
'Sit' at the study desk and use 1st-person-view to sort those fiddly inventory items - notes, letters, journals, gems etc.
 
In the treasury room, you'll find mannequins, shield mounts, a unique weapon-display wall and GameBanshees amazing Skyrim map - displayed in-game for your tactical scrutiny. Walk up to the map in 1st-person and pan your view around to work out your nearest fast-travel point, plan an immersive horse ride, or plan your next move. (Purely visual - Won't unlock locations you haven't found.)

A automated dynamic "mini-museum" charts your playthrough progress by displaying souvenirs related to quests you've finished.
 
Out back on the deck, you can sit and watch some killer sunrises and there's a barbecue/mead keg for you and your followers to unwind.  
White River is now your personal swimming pool for you immersive bathers / fish harvesting types, or to fill water bottles etc.
 
[color=#ff8c00][b][size=4]Cant open the front door? There's a clue right nearby if you look in the right place.[/size][/b][/color]

[youtube]0DbqGuaeY8U[/youtube]
________________________________________________________________________________________
 
[color=#b22222][size=5][b]:: REQUIREMENTS ::[/b][/size][/color]
- Skyrim up to date
- Dawnguard DLC
- Hearthfires DLC
- Dragonborn DLC

[color=#b22222][size=5][b]:: KNOWN CONFLICT :: [/b][/size][/color]
- This house conflicts with the Bathing Beauties Luxury Suite mod due to them occupying same world space.
This was accidental. Choose one or the other. DO NOT post about BBLS or the post will be deleted!
A "BBLS Compatible" version is available in 'Files' but only the main house will be maintained.

[b][color=#a61c00][size=5]WE DO RECOMMEND THE UNOFFICIAL PATCHES (USKP) TO ENSURE BROKEN QUESTS ARE FIXED AND THE DISPLAY CAN WORK AS INTENDED[/size][/color][size=4]
[/size][color=#cc4125][size=6]
[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#cc4125][size=6]Here's a list of all the trophies (Thanks, user "just a loser" or whichever you'd liked to be referred to as ♥) since people often ask how to unlock certain trophies:[/size][/color][/b]

[spoiler] Top Row
1. Complete Pieces of the Past
2. Complete A Night to Remember
3. Complete Discerning the Transmundane
4. Complete The House of Horrors
5. Complete The Break of Dawn
6. Complete The Main Questline
7. Complete The Black Star
8. Complete The Mind of Madness
9. Complete Waking Nightmare
10. Complete A Daedra's Best Friend
11. Complete Blindsighted


Middle Row
1. This trophy should be obtained by clearing the Bard College quests, but isn't. It appears to be instead triggered by completing Repairing the Phial
2. Complete Conjuration Ritual Spell
3. Complete Boethiah's Calling
4. Complete Ill Met by Moonlight
5. Complete The Only Cure
6. Complete The civil war questline
7. Complete the Companions questline
8. Complete The Heart of Dibella, The Blessings of Nature and the Book of Love
9. Complete the Dark Brotherhood questline
10. Complete Discerning the Transmundane
11. Complete No Stone Unturned


Bottom Row

1. Complete 50 side jobs for the Thieves Guild
2. Complete Arniel's Endeavor
3. Complete Lost to the Ages
4. Complete Ancient Technology (Note: This is only obtainable if you choose to side with the Dawnguard)
5. Obtain the spell to summon Arvak
6. Complete the College of Winterhold questline
7. Complete At the Summit of Apocrypha
8. Complete The Wolf Queen Awakened
9. Complete The Path of Knowledge
10. Complete Unearthed
11. Complete Repairing the Phial
Cake or pie?: Cake[/spoiler]

 [color=#b22222][size=5][b]:: LOCATION :: [/b][/size][/color]
- Across the road from Battle-Born farm, just east of Whiterun
 
[size=5][color=#ffa500][b]:: GENERAL ::[/b][/color][/size]
- 1 follower bed
- Displays for vanilla dragonpriest masks
- Navmeshed
- Cleaned and polished with TES5Edit
- All storage is non-respawn


As this house is not "my typical work", but a joint effort, the credits for each parts of the project go:
